title: The Otonokizaka Ranch Project
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>*Sigh*~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>What’s wrong? It’s rare to see you sigh, Honoka.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>You see, I asked Mari-san if her heli could take our alpacas to an open place. But they were over the weight limit, so we couldn’t do it. But I really want to let them run around somewhere spacious~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>You can’t take alpacas on a heli? Well, that makes sense.... But Lanzhu is touched by your kindness in wanting to give them somewhere to run around! Lanzhu will help you come up with something!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Really!? Thank you, Lanzhu-chan~! Is there a good way to do it? I was thinking of borrowing a big trolley and using it to carry them....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Hmm.... But wouldn’t that be dangerous on big roads with lots of cars?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I guess that’s true~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>That’s it! We can just build a ranch in Otonokizaka!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeeeeh!? In Otonokizaka!? Uwaaah, that sounds extremely fun! If we can build one, I want to raise goats, sheep, and cows and make ice cream with the milk!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>That’s great! Wait a minute, Lanzhu will ask Emma how to raise goats!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
